Purpose: Specifies the OpenStack ironic vendor-independent redfish hardware type bios.py module requirements of a Redfish service implementation, typically offered by a baseboard management controller (BMC).

ResetBios.Purpose: BIOS hardware interface implementation must offer the ability to reset BIOS settings to their factory default values
